hero.title: Israel Growth Venture
hero.subtitle: Your Strategic Partner for Successful Expansion in Israel
hero.description: We specialize in supporting brands for their successful expansion into the Israeli market. With our expertise and network, we offer tailored solutions to help businesses establish, grow, and thrive in one of the most dynamic and innovative markets in the world.

cta.title: Ready to start your expansion?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today for a free consultation

about.title: Who are we?
about.description: We are a company specialized in brand expansion consulting and active search for commercial real estate. Our team of brand implementation specialists will advise you and find the best locations to develop your brand in Israel.
about.collaboration: We collaborate with municipalities and major property owners to actively promote and seek clients for various commercial zone development projects.
about.support: Since the Israeli market is very difficult to access, our team can guide clients from creating a business plan to selecting the team of employees. We offer comprehensive support to ensure the success of your expansion.
about.service: If you are looking to establish and grow your brand or expand your concept through franchises or branches, the Israel Growth Venture team is at your service.

step1.title: Schedule a Meeting with an Expert
step1.description: Discuss your expansion project in Israel with our specialists.

step2.title: Get a Free Preliminary Analysis
step2.description: We assess your potential and provide an initial overview of opportunities.

step3.title: We Handle Your Expansion
step3.description: From property search to full establishment, we support you at every step.

packs.title: Our Packs
packs.subtitle: Solutions tailored to your expansion needs

analyse.name: Analysis Pack
analyse.description: Complete analysis of the Israeli market for up to 3 store openings

succursales.name: Branches Pack
succursales.description: Complete solution for opening branches in Israel

franchise.name: Franchise Pack
franchise.description: Complete development of your franchise network

futureCommerce.title: The retail you practice is dead.
futureCommerce.subtitle: Israel: where the future of retail is created before others

hero.line1: The retail you practice is dead.
hero.line2: Not in 10 years. Not in 5 years.
hero.description: Brands that continue to open stores like in 2010 are clinging to a model that no longer exists. Consumers no longer want to buy: they want to live, feel, test, participate.

israel.title: Israel: where the future of retail is created before others
israel.subtitle: Israel is not a market. It's a laboratory.
points: Consumers adopt in 3 months what Europe takes 3 years to understand.
Usage changes faster than business plans.
Concepts survive only if they are genuinely good.
Digital and physical are no longer separate: everything is hybrid, everything is instant.
israel.conclusion: If your concept holds in Israel, it's ready for the future.

realities.title: 3 Realities that brands must understand now

reality1.title: The customer no longer buys a product, they buy an experience
reality1.description: And this experience must start before they enter the store, and continue after they leave.

reality2.title: Retail is no longer a place. It's a medium.
reality2.description: A store that tells nothing sells nothing.

reality3.title: The business model must integrate:
reality3.conclusion: Many refuse to admit it. But those who succeed are those who face reality.

what_we_do.title: What we do at IGV
what_we_do.description: We test concepts in real conditions, here, in the fastest country in the world to validate an idea:
what_we_do.conclusion: IGV is not consulting. It's execution.

why_series.title: Why a "Future of Retail" series?
why_series.description: Because brands need to understand where retail is going, to know where to place their bets.
items: a truth no one dares to say
why_series.conclusion: No theory. No buzzwords. Just ground reality, now.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to answer your questions

appointment.title: Book an Appointment
appointment.subtitle: Let's discuss your expansion project in Israel
appointment.description: Book a 30-minute slot with our team to discuss your project. We'll analyze your concept and define the best strategy for your expansion.
